titleStmt.title: A short review of some reflections made by a nameless author upon Dr. Crisp's sermons, in a piece entituled Crispianism unmask'd with some remarks upon the union in the late agreement in doctrin among the dissenting ministers in London : subscribed the 16th of December, 1692, and that as referring unto the present debates ... / by Thomas Edwards, esq.
titleStmt.author: Edwards, Thomas, fl. 1693-1699.
Crisp, Tobias, 1600-1643.
